thread.title: Shale Surges, But Oil Market Power Swings Back to Saudis

author: Alison Sider
title: Shale Surges, But Oil Market Power Swings Back to Saudis
text:
The U.S. is producing more oil than ever, but when it comes to pulling the strings of the market, Saudi Arabia is still king.
Oil is flowing from shale fields at a record pace, propelling U.S. output to roughly double in a decade. That remarkable growth had led some observers to pronounce the U.S. the new swing producer in the marketâ€”a mantle long held by Saudi Arabia.
Yet...
